channel.title: Log all chat to a txt
channel.description: i need a script that will log all the chat to a txt and have it named <playerame>.txt where playername is the name of your bot. i need this so i can update the PlyrChat random. if i have a better idea of what people say i can add and remove some stuff from it. i need it to save it in the Aryan folder in a folder called logs or somthing like that.

item.title: Log all chat to a txt

item.description:

i need a script that will log all the chat to a txt and have it named .txt where playername is the name of your bot.
i need this so i can update the PlyrChat random. if i have a better idea of what people say i can add and remove some stuff from it. i need it to save it in the Aryan folder in a folder called logs or somthing like that.
